headline: Why FedEx (FDX) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of parcel and cargo delivery company FedEx (NYSE:FDX) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after the company's Supply Chain division announced it will cut 611 jobs in Memphis, Tennessee.

headline: Parcel carriers hike surcharges for busy holiday season
summary: New UPS and DHL surcharges will add delivery costs for customers during the upcoming peak season. The post Parcel carriers hike surcharges for busy holiday season appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: UPS unveils 2025 holiday shipping surcharges
summary: The timing of this year's added fees have led to some of the delivery giant's customers "scrambling to negotiate peak surcharges," one expert said.
